title: New Caledonia SMS Verification Issues (UPDATED 3rd June)
body:
Calling all New Caledonia players, we've heard that a players from New Caledonia are having issues verifying through SMS for Clash and we'd like to better understand the problem.

If you're from New Caledonia and you're not able to verify your number and it is NOT a prepaid phone number, please let us know here. Additionally, please [send in a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to player support with the phone number that you're trying to verify included.


**UPDATE 3rd June: **
We've made another change to the verification step in Clash SMS verification, we've confirmed that a New Caledonia number verified successfully. Only post-paid phone numbers can be used to verify, see [this index](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Telephone_numbers_in_New_Caledonia) for details on which numbers will work.

replies.body:
UPDATE: 
We've made a change that we believe will allow post-paid/subscription phones in New Caledonia to work.  Please re-login to League, try and authenticate with Clash again, and let us know if it works.
